Method Detail

create

public static IEssbase create(java.lang.String japiVerUsed)
                       throws com.essbase.api.base.EssException
Creates an instance of JAPI.

Parameters:
japiVerUsed - The JAPI version used when compiling the client. Make sure to pass only IEssbase.JAPI_VERSION, and do not pass any hard coded string. Example usage is: create(IEssbase.JAPI_VERSION). This is useful for future compatibility - i.e in case you compile with one version of JAPI and attempt to run with a totally non compatible version of JAPI, this method will throw an exception.
Returns:
The JAPI instance.
Throws:
com.essbase.api.base.EssException - if an error occurs.
